articles.content:
Bridgerton hunk Regé-Jean Page has been seen cuddling up to his girlfriend in a tender embrace in the snow.

articles.title: Maddie Ziegler: ‘I knew that people were going to love Music or hate it’ - The Independent
articles.description: The dancer, best known for being Sia Furler’s muse, is now the lead in the pop singer’s controversial directorial debut, playing a girl with autism. She talks to Ann Lee about stardom, sisterhood and Shia LeBeouf

articles.title: Dani Dyer forced to defend herself from mum-shamers over baby Santiago's outfit - Mirror Online
articles.description: Love Island winner Dani Dyer hit back at critics after she shared a sweet video of the son she shares with boyfriend Sammy Kimmence wrapped up in his winter coat
